    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM       http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:openlearn.open.ac.uk:D218_3</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>LearningSpace</catalog>
            <entry>D218_3</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en-gb">Social construction and social constructionism</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialaufbau und Sozialconstructionism</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Construction sociale et constructionism social</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Construção social e constructionism social</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Costruzione sociale e constructionism sociale</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνική κατασκευή και κοινωνικό constructionism</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Construcción social y constructionism social</string>
          </title>
          <language>en-gb</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en-gb">Within the field of social sciences the terms social construction and social constructionism are frequently used, particularly in relation to social policy. This unit will enable you to achieve a greater definition and understanding of these terms.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Society</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Audio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Social_construction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Social_constructionalism</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Social_policy</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Social_science</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Social_welfare</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>linear</value>
          </structure>
          <aggregationLevel>
            <source>aggregationLevelValues</source>
            <value>2</value>
          </aggregationLevel>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Innerhalb auffangene von Sozialwissenschaften 
werden der Bezeichnungen Sozialaufbau und das Sozialconstructionism 
häufig, besonders in bezug auf eine Sozialpolitik verwendet. 
Diese Maßeinheit aktiviert Sie, eine grössere Definition und 
ein Verstehen dieser Bezeichnungen zu erzielen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dans la zone des sciences sociales la construction 
sociale de limites et le constructionism social sont fréquemment 
utilisés, en particulier par rapport à la politique sociale. 
Cette unité vous permettra de réaliser une plus grands 
définition et arrangement de ces limites.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Dentro do campo de ciências sociais a construção
social dos termos e o constructionism social são usados 
freqüentemente, particularmente com relação à política social. 
Esta unidade permiti-lo-á de conseguir uma definição e uma 
compreensão mais grandes destes termos.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">All'interno del campo delle scienze sociali la 
costruzione sociale di termini ed il constructionism sociale sono 
usati frequentemente, specialmente rispetto alla politica sociale. 
Questa unità vi permetterà di realizzare una definizione e 
capire più grandi di questi termini.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μέσα στο πεδίο των κοινωνικών επιστημών η κοινωνική 
κατασκευή όρων και το κοινωνικό constructionism 
χρησιμοποιούνται συχνά, ιδιαίτερα σε σχέση με την κοινωνική 
πολιτική. Αυτή η μονάδα θα επιτρέψει σε σας για να επιτύχει
έναν μεγαλύτερους καθορισμό και μια κατανόηση αυτών των όρων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Dentro del campo de ciencias sociales la 
construcción social de los términos y el constructionism social se 
utilizan con frecuencia, determinado en lo referente a la política 
social. Esta unidad le permitirá alcanzar una mayores 
definición y entender de estos términos.</string>
          </description>
